Sentencas: Recently, the strong chemical interaction between Ni and GDC (Gd2O3-CeO2) was reported for the cermet anode of Ni-GDC in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs);(1) CeO2 species migrated on the Ni surface after exposure to the reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This surface modification of nickel affected the catalytic properties for carbon deposition and CO adsorption.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Generally, such a chemical interaction is promoted by the oxidation-reduction (redox) treatment.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, then, the influence of redox treatment on catalytic and electrochemical properties of Ni-GDC cermets was investigated in detail to establish a new design concept of anodes.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Ni-GDC cermet subjected to the redox treatment showed high tolerance to carbon deposition.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the redox treatment did not affect the mechanism of electrochemical hydrogen oxidation in humidified hydrogen atmospheres.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We also demonstrated the stable power generation of the single cell employing the optimized Ni-GDC anode at 1000 degrees C in a wet methane atmosphere with a steam to carbon ratio of 0.1.
Titulo: Redox-Induced Self-Modification of Cermet Anodes of Ni-CeO2-Based Oxide for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
